title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 339.3 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 339.3 - Policy

State Regulations

Professional staff employees may be retired and their
services terminated by the board of trustees, after receipt of the
recommendation of the chancellor and upon medical advice, for mental or
physical incapacity which prevents such persons from adequately performing
their duties. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
339.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
